line.text: Some glory in their birth some in their skill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Some in their wealth some in their body force
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Some in their garments though new-fangled ill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Some in their hawks and hounds some in their horse
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And every humour hath his adjunct pleasure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Wherein it finds a joy above the rest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But these particulars are not my measure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All these I better in one general best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy love is better than high birth to me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Richer than wealth prouder than garments costs
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of more delight than hawks and horses be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And having thee of all men pride I boast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Wretched in this alone that thou mayst take
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All this away and me most wretchcd make
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
